astromancy.gui.book.title: Stella Libri
astromancy.gui.book.entry.page.text.intr: This book should prove to be useful as I gather more information about the power of the stars. I plan to keep track of everything I learn here, along with any notes I may need to keep around.
Who knows what I'll find. I'm sure I'll find something useful, at least.
astromancy.gui.book.entry.armillary_sphe: A device that can be used to divine the locations of a star.
astromancy.gui.book.entry.page.text.armi: The Armillary Sphere is a device that can be used to divine the locations of a star. It does not seem to give me the full stellar location. Maybe I should look into the rituals of old using Sun Dials
